security: This file contains personnel information about James W. McCord, Jr., including his retirement details, performance reviews, and security clearance. Disclosing this information could compromise his privacy and potentially reveal sensitive information about CIA personnel management practices.
summary: This file contains documents related to James W. McCord, Jr.'s employment and retirement from the CIA, including performance reviews, commendations, and administrative details surrounding his involuntary retirement in 1970.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the career and retirement of James W. McCord, Jr. from the CIA, covering the period from June 1951 to April 1974. Key documents include a letter from Richard Helms acknowledging McCord's service, memoranda detailing his involuntary retirement due to personnel surplus, commendations for his contributions to technical and physical security, and administrative paperwork related to his retirement benefits. The file indicates that McCord, a Physical Security Officer, was designated a participant in the CIA Retirement and Disability System before his retirement became effective on August 31, 1970.
title: The Coch James W., Jr.
